triples.name: Large language model
triples.relevance: LLMs are the core technology being integrated into robots in this study to enable conversational capabilities.

triples.name: Human-robot interaction
triples.relevance: This is the primary research domain of the paper, examining how humans interact with LLM-powered robots.

triples.name: Chatbot
triples.relevance: Chatbots and conversational interfaces represent the conversational AI architecture underlying LLM-powered robot interaction.

triples.name: Robot
triples.relevance: Robots are the physical platforms being augmented with LLM capabilities in this study.

triples.name: User research
triples.relevance: The paper proposes and conducts a user study (n=32) comparing LLM-powered robots with text and voice agents.

triples.name: Nonverbal communication
triples.relevance: The study reveals that LLM-powered robots raise user expectations for sophisticated non-verbal cues and communication.
